content: this pattern makes a replica of oluwande s hat in the tv show *our flag means death* the hat will sit low on the head as opposed to the one in the show it uses knitting in the round stranded colour work and a bottom up construction these are not explained in detail in the pattern a chart for a 20 stitch wide pattern is given which makes the base of the sizing 9 patterns makes a size l hat 8 patterns makes a size m hat and 7 patterns makes a size s hat for the smallest size length and crown intake may have to be adjusted to produce a proportionate hat i suggest 100% wool so that a perfect size can be blocked and the crown shaping adjusted according to taste it also allows for instant distressing - to brush up a pile on the hat - if desired sample hat used ca 30 grams of each colour on 2 5 mm needles **update** 12th of march 2023 pattern chart error corrected and suggesting adjusting between sizes -problem with needle sizes to pattern thank you for all the continued positive feedback on this pattern i m so thrilled so many are enjoying it
